00051 LaMainForm::LaMainForm(QWidget* parent, Qt::WFlags fl)
00052   : QDialog(parent,fl)
00053 {
00054   //required by Qt4 to initialise the ui
00055   setupUi(this);
00056   readSettings();
00057   lblCropPix->setScaledContents(true);
00058   lblAnimalPix->setScaledContents(true);
00059   lblCropPicCalcs->setScaledContents(true);
00060   lblAnimalPicCalcs->setScaledContents(true);
00061 
00062   QStringList myWholeList;
00063   LaGrass myGrass;
00064   QStringList myMapsetList = myGrass.getMapsetList();
00065   cboMapSet->addItems(myMapsetList);
00066   QStringListIterator myIterator(myMapsetList);
00067   while (myIterator.hasNext())
00068   {
00069     //append the raster names in this mapet to our full list
00070     myWholeList << myGrass.getRasterList(myIterator.next());
00071   }
00072   QString myMapset = cboMapSet->currentText();
00073   QStringList myList = myGrass.getRasterList(myMapset);
00074   cboDEM->addItems(myList);
00075   cboCommonGrazingRaster->addItems(myList);
00076   cboCommonCropRaster->addItems(myList);
00077 
00078   //cboDEM->addItems(myGrass.getRasterList("
00079   lblVersion->setText(QString("Version: %1").arg(VERSION) + " " + QString("$Revision: 610 $").replace("$",""));
00080   tblAnimals->horizontalHeader()->hide();
00081   tblAnimals->verticalHeader()->hide();
00082   tblAnimals->horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(2,QHeaderView::Stretch);
00083   tblCrops->horizontalHeader()->hide();
00084   tblCrops->verticalHeader()->hide();
00085   tblCrops->horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(2,QHeaderView::Stretch);
00086   listWidgetCalculationsAnimal->clear();
00087   loadAnimals();
00088   loadCrops();
00089   cbAreaUnits->addItem("Dunum");
00090   cbAreaUnits->addItem("Hectare");
00091   cbCommonLandEnergyType->addItem("KCalories");
00092   cbCommonLandEnergyType->addItem("TDN");
00093 
00094   setDietLabels();
00102   connect(treeHelp, SIGNAL(currentItemChanged(QTreeWidgetItem * ,QTreeWidgetItem *)),
00103       this, SLOT(helpItemClicked(QTreeWidgetItem * ,QTreeWidgetItem *)));
00104   connect(listWidgetCalculationsCrop, SIGNAL(currentItemChanged(QListWidgetItem * ,QListWidgetItem *)),
00105       this, SLOT(cropCalcClicked(QListWidgetItem * ,QListWidgetItem *)));
00106   connect(listWidgetCalculationsAnimal, SIGNAL(currentItemChanged(QListWidgetItem * ,QListWidgetItem *)),
00107       this, SLOT(animalCalcClicked(QListWidgetItem * ,QListWidgetItem *)));
00108   connect(pushButtonExit, SIGNAL(clicked()), qApp, SLOT(quit()));
00109   connect(tblAnimals, SIGNAL(cellClicked( int,int)),
00110       this, SLOT(animalCellClicked( int,int)));
00111   connect(tblAnimals, SIGNAL(cellChanged( int,int)),
00112       this, SLOT(animalCellChanged( int,int)));
00113   connect(tblCrops, SIGNAL(cellClicked( int,int)),
00114       this, SLOT(cropCellClicked( int,int)));
00115   connect(tblCrops, SIGNAL(cellChanged( int,int)),
00116       this, SLOT(cropCellChanged( int,int)));
00117   connect(cbDebug, SIGNAL(clicked()),
00118       this, SLOT(on_cbDebug_clicked()));
00119 }

00126 void LaMainForm::readSettings()
00127 {
00128   QSettings mySettings;
00129   QPoint pos = mySettings.value("mainwindow/pos", QPoint(200, 200)).toPoint();
00130   QSize size = mySettings.value("mainwindow/size", QSize(400, 400)).toSize();
00131   resize(size);
00132   move(pos);
00133 
00134   //
00135   // Restore controls to their last used values
00136   //
00137   lineEditSiteName->setText(mySettings.value("siteName","").toString());
00138   lineEditEasting->setText(mySettings.value("easting","").toString());
00139   lineEditNorthing->setText(mySettings.value("northing","").toString());
00140   sliderDiet->setValue(mySettings.value("percentPlantDiet","50").toInt());
00141   sbCommonRasterValue->setValue(mySettings.value("commonValue","40").toInt());
00142 }
00143 
00144 void LaMainForm::writeSettings()
00145 {
00146   QSettings mySettings;
00147   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/pos", pos());
00148   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/size", size());
00149 
00150   //
00151   // Store defaults
00152   //
00153   mySettings.setValue("siteName",lineEditSiteName->text());
00154   mySettings.setValue("easting",lineEditEasting->text());
00155   mySettings.setValue("northing",lineEditNorthing->text());
00156   mySettings.setValue("percentPlantDiet",sliderDiet->value());
00157   mySettings.setValue("commonValue",sbCommonRasterValue->value());
00158 }

00209 QString LaMainForm::getMatchingCropParameterGuid(QString theCropGuid)
00210 {
00211   QPair<bool, QString> myPair = mCropsMap.value(theCropGuid);
00212   QString myCropParameterGuid = myPair.second;

00223 QPair <int, int> LaMainForm::getSiteCoordinates()
00224 {
00225   QPair <int, int> myCoordinates;
00226   QString myNorthing = lineEditNorthing->text();
00227   QString myEasting = lineEditEasting->text();
00228 
00229   myCoordinates.first = myEasting.toInt();
00230   myCoordinates.second = myNorthing.toInt();
00231 
00232   return myCoordinates;
00233 }

00242 QMap <QString, QString> LaMainForm::getSelectedCrops()
00243 {
00244   //qDebug() << "mCropsMap :::::: " << mCropsMap;
00245 
00246   QMap<QString, QString> mySelectedCropsMap;
00247   QMapIterator<QString, QPair<bool, QString> > myCropIterator(mCropsMap);
00248   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
00249   {
00250     myCropIterator.next();
00251     QPair<bool,QString> myPair = myCropIterator.value();
00252     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
00253     QString myCropParameterGuid = myPair.second;
00254     bool mySelectedFlag = myPair.first;
00255     if (mySelectedFlag)
00256     {
00257       mySelectedCropsMap.insert(myCropGuid,myCropParameterGuid);
00258     }
00259   }
00260     return mySelectedCropsMap;
00261 }

00284 void LaMainForm::on_pbnNewAnimalParameter_clicked()
00285 {
00286     int myCommonGrazingLandValue = sbCommonRasterValue->value();
00287     QString myComboBoxCommonLandEnergyType = cbCommonLandEnergyType->currentText();
00288     QString myCommonGrazingLandAreaUnits = cbAreaUnits->currentText();
00289     AreaUnits myAreaUnits = (myCommonGrazingLandAreaUnits == "Dunum") ? Dunum : Hectare;
00290     EnergyType myEnergyType = (myComboBoxCommonLandEnergyType == "KCalories") ? KCalories : TDN;
00291     QPair<LaTripleMap, int> myPair;
00292     myPair.first=mCropsMap;
00293     myPair.second=myCommonGrazingLandValue;
00294     LaAnimalParameterManager myAnimalParameterManager(myPair, myAreaUnits, myEnergyType);
00295     myAnimalParameterManager.exec();
00296     listWidgetCalculationsAnimal->clear();
00297     loadAnimals();
00298 }

00319   cboCommonGrazingRaster->addItems(myList);
00320   cboCommonCropRaster->addItems(myList);
00321 }

00338 void LaMainForm::loadAnimals()
00339 {
00340   listWidgetCalculationsAnimal->clear();
00341   LaModel myModel;
00342   myModel.clearCalcMaps();
00343   tblAnimals->clear();
00344   tblAnimals->setRowCount(0);
00345   tblAnimals->setColumnCount(4);
00346   //compute percentages each animal parameter adds to the total and
00347   //print the total perc. Its up to the user at this stage to ensure
00348   //that everything tots up to 100%
00349   int myCurrentRow=0;
00350   float myRunningPercentage=0.;
00351   QMap<QString,LaAnimal> myAnimalsMap = LaUtils::getAvailableAnimals();
00352   //debug statement to print all animal keys
00353   //qDebug((static_cast<QStringList>(myAnimalsMap.keys())).join("\n").toLocal8Bit());
00354   LaUtils::AnimalParameterMap myAnimalParametersMap;
00355   myAnimalParametersMap = LaUtils::getAvailableAnimalParameters();
00356   QMapIterator<QString, LaAnimal> myIterator(myAnimalsMap);
00357   while (myIterator.hasNext())
00358   {
00359     myIterator.next();
00360     LaAnimal myAnimal = myIterator.value();
00361     QString myGuid = myAnimal.guid();
00362     QString myName = myAnimal.name();
00363     QPair<bool,QString> myValue;
00364     //check if this animal is in mAnimalsMap and if not add it
00365     //with a blank pair for now
00366     if (!mAnimalsMap.contains(myGuid))
00367     {
00368       myValue.first = false;
00369       myValue.second = "";
00370       mAnimalsMap.insert(myGuid,myValue);
00371     }
00372     else
00373     {
00374       myValue=mAnimalsMap[myGuid];
00375     }
00376     QIcon myIcon;
00377     myIcon.addFile(":/localdata.png");
00378     tblAnimals->insertRow(myCurrentRow);
00379     // Add details to the new row
00380     QTableWidgetItem *mypUsedItem= new QTableWidgetItem(tr("Used?"));
00381     //QTableWidgetItem *mypUsedItem= new QTableWidgetItem(tr(""));
00382     if (myValue.first)
00383     {
00384       mypUsedItem->setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
00385       QListWidgetItem *myItem = new QListWidgetItem(myAnimal.name());
00386       myItem->setData(Qt::UserRole,myAnimal.guid());
00387       listWidgetCalculationsAnimal->addItem(myItem);
00388     }
00389     else
00390     {
00391       mypUsedItem->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
00392       // DE-populate the calcs QListWidgetItem
00393       QListWidgetItem *myItem = new QListWidgetItem(myAnimal.name());
00394       myItem->setData(Qt::UserRole,myAnimal.guid());
00395       listWidgetCalculationsAnimal->takeItem(listWidgetCalculationsAnimal->row(myItem));
00396     }
00397     tblAnimals->setItem(myCurrentRow, 0, mypUsedItem);
00398 
00399     QTableWidgetItem *mypNameItem = new QTableWidgetItem(myAnimal.name());
00400     mypNameItem->setData(Qt::UserRole,myGuid);
00401     tblAnimals->setItem(myCurrentRow, 1, mypNameItem);
00402     mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00403     //create a var to hold the percentage for each selected parameter
00404     //add the animal parameters combo to the form
00405     QComboBox * mypCombo = new QComboBox(this);
00406     QMapIterator<QString, LaAnimalParameter> myIterator(myAnimalParametersMap);
00407     while (myIterator.hasNext())
00408     {
00409       myIterator.next();
00410       LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = myIterator.value();
00411       QString myParameterGuid = myAnimalParameter.guid();
00412       QString myParameterName = myAnimalParameter.name() + "  (" + myAnimalParameter.description() + ")";
00413       //only add this entry if it is for the current animal
00414       if (myGuid != myAnimalParameter.animalGuid())
00415       {
00416         continue;
00417       }
00418       //if the animal paraameter id has not yet been set in mAnimalsMap
00419       //set it now...
00420       if (myValue.second.isEmpty())
00421       {
00422         myValue.second = myParameterGuid;
00423       }
00424       //see if this animal parameter percentage can be added to our running tot
00425       if (myValue.second == myAnimalParameter.guid())
00426       {
00427         if (myValue.first)
00428           {
00429             myRunningPercentage += myAnimalParameter.percentTameMeat();
00430           }
00431         QTableWidgetItem *mypPercentItem =
00432           new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(myAnimalParameter.percentTameMeat()));
00433         tblAnimals->setItem(myCurrentRow, 3, mypPercentItem);
00434       }
00435       //                icon,  disp name,      userdata
00436       mypCombo->addItem(myIcon,myParameterName,myParameterGuid);
00437     }
00438     setComboToDefault(mypCombo, myValue.second);
00439     mAnimalsMap[myGuid]=myValue;
00440     tblAnimals->setCellWidget ( myCurrentRow, 2, mypCombo);
00441     myCurrentRow++;
00442   }
00443   //finally show the total percentage all the selected animals contribute to the diet
00444   QIcon myIcon;
00445   if (myRunningPercentage==100)
00446   {
00447     myIcon.addFile(":/status_ok.png");
00448   }
00449   else
00450   {
00451     myIcon.addFile(":/status_error.png");
00452   }
00453   QString myPercentItem = QString::number(myRunningPercentage);
00454   labelAnimalCheck->setText(myPercentItem + "\%");
00455   //QLabel::setPixmap(labelAnimalCheck->(myIcon));
00456   //tblAnimals->insertRow(myCurrentRow);
00457   //QTableWidgetItem *mypLabelItem = new QTableWidgetItem(QString(tr("Total Diet %")));
00458   //tblAnimals->setItem(myCurrentRow, 1, mypLabelItem);
00459   //QTableWidgetItem *mypPercentItem =
00460   //        new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(myRunningPercentage));
00461   //mypPercentItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00462   //tblAnimals->setItem(myCurrentRow, 3, mypPercentItem);
00463 }
00464 
00465 void LaMainForm::loadCrops()
00466 {
00467   listWidgetCalculationsCrop->clear();
00468   tblCrops->clear();
00469   tblCrops->setRowCount(0);
00470   tblCrops->setColumnCount(4);
00471   //compute percentages each crop parameter adds to the total and
00472   //print the total perc. Its up to the user at this stage to ensure
00473   //that everything tots up to 100%
00474   int myCurrentRow=0;
00475   float myRunningPercentage=0.;
00476   QMap<QString,LaCrop> myCropsMap;
00477   myCropsMap = LaUtils::getAvailableCrops();
00478   //debug statemetn to print all crop keys
00479   //qDebug((static_cast<QStringList>(myCropsMap.keys())).join("\n").toLocal8Bit());
00480   LaUtils::CropParameterMap myCropParametersMap;
00481   myCropParametersMap = LaUtils::getAvailableCropParameters();
00482   QMapIterator<QString, LaCrop> myIterator(myCropsMap);
00483   while (myIterator.hasNext())
00484   {
00485     myIterator.next();
00486     LaCrop myCrop = myIterator.value();
00487     QString myGuid = myCrop.guid();
00488     QString myName = myCrop.name();
00489     QPair<bool,QString> myValue;
00490     //check if this crop is in mCropsMap and if not add it
00491     //with a blank pair for now
00492     if (!mCropsMap.contains(myGuid))
00493     {
00494       myValue.first = false;
00495       myValue.second = "";
00496       mCropsMap.insert(myGuid,myValue);
00497       //qDebug("Added new blank pair to mCrops map for keeping track of percentages: " +
00498       //    myGuid.toLocal8Bit());
00499     }
00500     else
00501     {
00502       myValue=mCropsMap[myGuid];
00503     }
00504 
00505     QIcon myIcon;
00506     myIcon.addFile(":/localdata.png");
00507     tblCrops->insertRow(myCurrentRow);
00508     // Add details to the new row
00509     QTableWidgetItem *mypUsedItem= new QTableWidgetItem(tr("Used?"));
00510     (myValue.first) ? mypUsedItem->setCheckState(Qt::Checked) : mypUsedItem->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
00511 
00512     tblCrops->setItem(myCurrentRow, 0, mypUsedItem);
00513     QTableWidgetItem *mypNameItem = new QTableWidgetItem(myCrop.name());
00514     mypNameItem->setData(Qt::UserRole,myGuid);
00515     tblCrops->setItem(myCurrentRow, 1, mypNameItem);
00516     mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00517     //create a var to hold the percentage for each selected parameter
00518     //add the crop parameters combo to the form
00519     QComboBox * mypCombo = new QComboBox(this);
00520     QMapIterator<QString, LaCropParameter> myIterator(myCropParametersMap);
00521     while (myIterator.hasNext())
00522     {
00523       myIterator.next();
00524       LaCropParameter myCropParameter = myIterator.value();
00525       QString myParameterGuid = myCropParameter.guid();
00526       QString myParameterName = myCropParameter.name()  + "  (" + myCropParameter.description() + ")";
00527       //only add this entry if it is for the current crop
00528       if (myGuid != myCropParameter.cropGuid())
00529       {
00530         continue;
00531       }
00532       //if the crop paraameter id has not yet been set in mCropsMap
00533       //set it now...
00534       if (myValue.second.isEmpty())
00535       {
00536         myValue.second = myParameterGuid;
00537       }
00538       //see if this crop parameter percentage can be added to our running tot
00539       //qDebug("Comparing " + myValue.second.toLocal8Bit() + " <-> " +
00540           //myCropParameter.guid().toLocal8Bit());
00541       if (myValue.second == myCropParameter.guid())
00542       {
00543         if (myValue.first)
00544           {
00545             myRunningPercentage += myCropParameter.percentTameCrop();
00546             QListWidgetItem *myItem = new QListWidgetItem(myCrop.name());
00547             myItem->setData(Qt::UserRole,myCrop.guid());
00548             listWidgetCalculationsCrop->addItem(myItem);
00549           }
00550         QTableWidgetItem *mypPercentItem =
00551           new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(myCropParameter.percentTameCrop()));
00552         //qDebug("Percentage this crop contributes to diet: " +
00553             //QString::number(myCropParameter.percentTameCrop()).toLocal8Bit());
00554         tblCrops->setItem(myCurrentRow, 3, mypPercentItem);
00555       }
00556       //                icon, disp name, userdata
00557       mypCombo->addItem(myIcon,myParameterName,myParameterGuid);
00558     }
00559     setComboToDefault(mypCombo, myValue.second);
00560     mCropsMap[myGuid]=myValue;
00561     tblCrops->setCellWidget ( myCurrentRow, 2, mypCombo);
00562     myCurrentRow++;
00563   }
00564   //finally show the total percentage all the selected crops contribute to the diet
00565   QIcon myIcon;
00566   (myRunningPercentage==100) ? myIcon.addFile(":/status_ok.png") : myIcon.addFile(":/status_error.png");
00567 
00568   QString myPercentItem = QString::number(myRunningPercentage);
00569   labelCropCheck->setText(myPercentItem + "\%");
00570 }
00571 
00572 void LaMainForm::setDietLabels()
00573 {
00574   /*  The problem here is that only the domestic meat value can be calculated until
00575       the entire model is set up.  Therefore, unless both Crops and Animals total
00576       100% these values are going to be bypassed and indicate to the user that they
00577       have to do so.
00578    */
00579   
00580   // variables needed for all calculations
00581   int myCaloriesIndividual = sbDailyCalories->value();
00582   int myPopulation = sbPopulation->value();
00583   float mykCaloriesIndividualAnnual = (myCaloriesIndividual*365.)/1000.;
00584   float mykCaloriesSettlementAnnual = mykCaloriesIndividualAnnual*myPopulation;
00585   
00586   //Meat Section  
00587   int myDietPercentMeat = sliderDiet->value();
00588     float myTameMeatPercentage = sliderMeat->value()*(myDietPercentMeat/100.);
00589 
00590   float myTameAnimalkCalories = (myTameMeatPercentage/100.)*mykCaloriesSettlementAnnual;
00591   labelCaloriesTameMeat->setText(QString::number(static_cast <int>(myTameAnimalkCalories)));
00592 
00593   // set labels for the sliders etc
00594   labelPortionMeat->setText(QString::number(myDietPercentMeat));
00595   labelPortionTameMeat->setText(QString::number(static_cast <int>(myTameMeatPercentage)));
00596   labelCaloriesSettlement->setText(QString::number(static_cast <int>(mykCaloriesSettlementAnnual)));
00597 
00598   // set primary calculation levels based on population and daily requirements
00599   labelCaloriesIndividual->setText(QString::number(mykCaloriesIndividualAnnual));
00600   
00601 
00602   //Crop and Dairy Section
00603   if (labelCropCheck->text() != "100\%" or labelAnimalCheck->text() != "100\%")
00604   { // the model is incomplete so calculations cannot be made
00605     
00606     labelPortionDairy->setText("Model not Completed");
00607     labelCaloriesCrops->setText("Model not Completed");
00608     labelPortionPlants->setText("Model not Completed");
00609     labelPortionCrops->setText("Model not Completed");
00610     return;
00611   }
00612   else // go ahead and do the calculations now
00613   {
00614     int myDairyCalories = getCalorieTargets();// QPair <crops,dairy>
00615     float myCropCalories = mykCaloriesSettlementAnnual - myDairyCalories - myTameAnimalkCalories;
00616     
00617     float myCropPercentage =  myCropCalories / mykCaloriesSettlementAnnual;
00618     float myDairyPercentage =  myDairyCalories / mykCaloriesSettlementAnnual;
00619 
00620     //float myTameCropkCalories = (myTameCropPercentage/100.)*mykCaloriesSettlementAnnual;
00621     //float myDairykCalories = 1.0; // implement this! 1.0 is temp only to test logic
00622     //labelPortionPlants->setText(QString::number(myDietPercentPlant));
00623     labelCaloriesCrops->setText(QString::number(static_cast <int>(myCropCalories)));
00624     labelCaloriesDairy->setText(QString::number(static_cast <int>(myDairyCalories)));
00625     labelPortionCrops->setText(QString::number(static_cast <int>(myCropPercentage)));
00626     labelPortionDairy->setText(QString::number(static_cast <int>(myDairyPercentage)));
00627   }
00628 }
00629 
00630 void LaMainForm::animalCellClicked(int theRow, int theColumn)
00631 {
00632   listWidgetCalculationsAnimal->clear();
00633   //qDebug("LaMainForm::animalCellClicked");
00634   QTableWidgetItem* mypItem = tblAnimals->item(tblAnimals->currentRow(),1);
00635   if (mypItem)
00636   {
00637     QString myGuid = mypItem->data(Qt::UserRole).toString();
00638     //QString myGuid = tblAnimals->item(tblAnimals->currentRow(),1)->data(Qt::UserRole).toString();
00639     //get all animals, then get the animal for this cell if it exists
00640     QMap<QString,LaAnimal> myAnimalsMap = LaUtils::getAvailableAnimals();
00641     LaAnimal myAnimal = myAnimalsMap[myGuid];
00642     QComboBox * mypCombo=dynamic_cast<QComboBox *>(tblAnimals->cellWidget(tblAnimals->currentRow(),2));
00643     myGuid = mypCombo->itemData(mypCombo->currentIndex(),Qt::UserRole).toString();
00644     //get all animal parameters, then get the animal parameter for this cell if it exists
00645     LaUtils::AnimalParameterMap myAnimalParametersMap;
00646     myAnimalParametersMap = LaUtils::getAvailableAnimalParameters();
00647     LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = myAnimalParametersMap[myGuid];
00648     showAnimalDefinitionReport(myAnimal,myAnimalParameter);
00649     lblAnimalPix->setPixmap(myAnimal.imageFile());
00650   }
00651   listWidgetCalculationsAnimal->clear();
00652   loadAnimals();
00653 }

00655 void LaMainForm::animalCellChanged(int theRow, int theColumn)
00656 {
00657   //listWidgetCalculationsAnimal->clear();
00658   QTableWidgetItem* mypItem = tblAnimals->item(tblAnimals->currentRow(),1);
00659   if (mypItem)
00660   {
00661     QString myGuid = mypItem->data(Qt::UserRole).toString();
00662     // QString myGuid = tblAnimals->item(tblAnimals->currentRow(),1)->data(Qt::UserRole).toString();
00663     bool myStateFlag = tblAnimals->item(tblAnimals->currentRow(),0)->checkState();
00664     QPair<bool,QString> myPair = mAnimalsMap[myGuid];
00665     myPair.first = myStateFlag;
00666     QComboBox * mypCombo=dynamic_cast<QComboBox *>(tblAnimals->cellWidget(tblAnimals->currentRow(),2));
00667     myPair.second = mypCombo->itemData(mypCombo->currentIndex(),Qt::UserRole).toString();
00668     mAnimalsMap[myGuid] = myPair;
00669     //debug only - comment out later
00670     //printCropsAndAnimals();
00671   }
00672 }

00674 void LaMainForm::cropCellClicked(int theRow, int theColumn)
00675 {
00676     QTableWidgetItem* mypItem = tblCrops->item(tblCrops->currentRow(),1);
00677   if (mypItem)
00678   {
00679     QString myGuid = mypItem->data(Qt::UserRole).toString();
00680     //get all crops, then get the crop for this cell if it exists
00681     QMap<QString,LaCrop> myCropsMap = LaUtils::getAvailableCrops();
00682     LaCrop myCrop = myCropsMap[myGuid];
00683     textBrowserCropDefinition->setHtml(myCrop.toHtml());
00684     QComboBox * mypCombo=dynamic_cast<QComboBox *>(tblCrops->cellWidget(tblCrops->currentRow(),2));
00685     myGuid = mypCombo->itemData(mypCombo->currentIndex(),Qt::UserRole).toString();
00686     //get all crops parameters, then get the crop parameter for this cell if it exists
00687     LaUtils::CropParameterMap myCropParametersMap;
00688     myCropParametersMap = LaUtils::getAvailableCropParameters();
00689     LaCropParameter myCropParameter = myCropParametersMap[myGuid];
00690     lblCropPix->setPixmap(myCrop.imageFile());
00691     showCropDefinitionReport(myCrop,myCropParameter);
00692   }
00693   loadCrops();
00694 }

00700 void LaMainForm::cropCellChanged(int theRow, int theColumn)
00701 {
00702   QTableWidgetItem* mypItem = tblCrops->item(tblCrops->currentRow(),1);
00703   if (mypItem)
00704   {
00705     QString myGuid = mypItem->data(Qt::UserRole).toString();
00706     bool myStateFlag = tblCrops->item(tblCrops->currentRow(),0)->checkState();
00707     QPair<bool,QString> myPair = mCropsMap[myGuid];
00708     myPair.first = myStateFlag;
00709     QComboBox * mypCombo=dynamic_cast<QComboBox *>(tblCrops->cellWidget(tblCrops->currentRow(),2));
00710     myPair.second = mypCombo->itemData(mypCombo->currentIndex(),Qt::UserRole).toString();
00711     mCropsMap[myGuid] = myPair;
00712   }
00713 }
00714 
00715 void LaMainForm::on_pushButtonRun_clicked()
00716 {
00717   if (labelCropCheck->text() != "100\%" or labelAnimalCheck->text() != "100\%")
00718     {
00719       tbReport->setText("Check that Animals and Crops are both at 100%\n");
00720       tbReport->append("I am NOT going to do anything until you do!");
00721       return;
00722     }
00723 
00724   // show the user that the computer is thinking
00725   progressBarCalcs->reset();
00726   progressBarCalcs->setRange(0,9);
00727 
00728   LaModel myModel;
00729   connect(&myModel, SIGNAL(message( QString )),
00730              this, SLOT(logMessage( QString )));
00731 
00732   progressBarCalcs->setValue(1);
00733   // Get a list of the selected animals
00734   QMap<QString,QString> mySelectedAnimalsMap;
00735   //          <animal guid <enabled, animalparamters guid>>
00736   QMapIterator<QString, QPair<bool, QString> > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
00737   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
00738   {
00739     myAnimalIterator.next();
00740     QPair<bool,QString> myPair = myAnimalIterator.value();
00741     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
00742     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myPair.second;
00743     bool mySelectedFlag = myPair.first;
00744     if (mySelectedFlag)
00745     {
00746       mySelectedAnimalsMap.insert(myAnimalGuid,myAnimalParameterGuid);
00747       //qDebug("Added <" + myAnimalGuid.toLocal8Bit() + " , " + myAnimalParameterGuid.toLocal8Bit() + " >");
00748     }
00749   }
00750   myModel.setAnimals(mySelectedAnimalsMap);
00751 
00752   // Get a list of the selected crops
00753   QMap<QString,QString> mySelectedCropsMap;
00754   // <crop guid <enabled, cropparamters guid>>
00755   QMapIterator<QString, QPair<bool, QString> > myCropIterator(mCropsMap);
00756   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
00757   {
00758     myCropIterator.next();
00759     QPair<bool,QString> myPair = myCropIterator.value();
00760     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
00761     QString myCropParameterGuid = myPair.second;
00762     bool mySelectedFlag = myPair.first;
00763     if (mySelectedFlag)
00764     {
00765       mySelectedCropsMap.insert(myCropGuid,myCropParameterGuid);
00766       //qDebug("Added <" + myCropGuid.toLocal8Bit() + " , " + myCropParameterGuid.toLocal8Bit() + " >");
00767     }
00768   }
00769   myModel.setCrops(mySelectedCropsMap);
00770   // Populate the model with all the form data
00771   myModel.setName(lineEditSiteName->text());
00772   myModel.setPopulation(sbPopulation->value());
00773   myModel.setPeriod(lineEditPeriod->text());
00774   //myModel.setProjection(cbProjection->currentIndex());
00775   myModel.setEasting(lineEditEasting->text().toInt());
00776   myModel.setNorthing(lineEditNorthing->text().toInt());
00777   myModel.setEuclideanDistance(radioButtonEuclidean->isChecked());
00778   myModel.setWalkingTime(radioButtonWalkingTime->isChecked());
00779   myModel.setPathDistance(radioButtonPathDistance->isChecked());
00780   myModel.setPrecision(sbModelPrecision->value());
00781   myModel.setDietPercent(sliderDiet->value());
00782   myModel.setCropPercent(sliderCrop->value());
00783   myModel.setMeatPercent(sliderMeat->value());
00784   myModel.setCaloriesPerPersonDaily(sbDailyCalories->value());
00785   myModel.setDairyUse(sbDairyUse->value());
00786   // the following adjusts the Value value for use with hectares
00787   // which is the only output that is used.
00788   QString mySelectedAreaUnit = QString(cbAreaUnits->currentText());
00789   AreaUnits myAreaUnits = (mySelectedAreaUnit == "Dunum") ? Dunum:Hectare;
00790 
00791   int myValue = sbCommonRasterValue->value();
00792   myModel.setCommonLandValue(myValue, myAreaUnits);
00793 
00794   tbReport->setHtml(myModel.toHtml());
00795   progressBarCalcs->setValue(2);
00796 
00797   myModel.DoCalculations();
00798   progressBarCalcs->setValue(3);
00799 
00800   tbReport->append(myModel.toHtmlCalorieCropTargets());
00801   progressBarCalcs->setValue(4);
00802 
00803   tbReport->append(myModel.toHtmlCalorieAnimalTargets());
00804   progressBarCalcs->setValue(5);
00805 
00806   tbReport->append(myModel.toHtmlProductionCropTargets());
00807   progressBarCalcs->setValue(6);
00808 
00809   tbReport->append(myModel.toHtmlProductionAnimalTargets());
00810   progressBarCalcs->setValue(7);
00811 
00812   tbReport->append(myModel.toHtmlAreaCropTargets());
00813   progressBarCalcs->setValue(8);
00814 
00815   tbReport->append(myModel.toHtmlAreaAnimalTargets());
00816   progressBarCalcs->setValue(9);
00817 
00818 
00819 
00820   QMap<QString, int> myAnimalTargetsMap = myModel.getAreaTargetsAnimalsMap();
00821   QMap<QString, int> myCropsTargetsMap = myModel.getAreaTargetsCropsMap();
00822 
00823   QString myDEM = cboDEM->currentText();
00824   QString myMapset = cboMapSet->currentText();
00825   QString myCommonCropRaster = cboCommonCropRaster->currentText();
00826   QString myCommonGrazingRaster = cboCommonGrazingRaster->currentText();
00827 
00828   QPair <QString, QString> myDEMandMapset;
00829   myDEMandMapset.first = myDEM;
00830   myDEMandMapset.second = myMapset;
00831   QPair <QString, QString> myCropAndGrazingRasters;
00832   myCropAndGrazingRasters.first = myCommonCropRaster;
00833   myCropAndGrazingRasters.second = myCommonGrazingRaster;
00834 
00835   LaRasterInfo myRasterInfo;
00836   myRasterInfo.first = myDEMandMapset;
00837   myRasterInfo.second = myCropAndGrazingRasters;
00838 
00839   QPair <int, int> myCoordinates;
00840     QString myEasting = lineEditEasting->text();
00841     QString myNorthing = lineEditNorthing->text();
00842     myCoordinates.first = myEasting.toInt();
00843     myCoordinates.second = myNorthing.toInt();
00844 
00845   QPair<QMap<QString, int>, QMap<QString, int> > myPairOfAreaTargetMaps;
00846     myPairOfAreaTargetMaps.first=myAnimalTargetsMap;
00847     myPairOfAreaTargetMaps.second=myCropsTargetsMap;
00848 
00849   LaGrassProcess myGrassProcess(myRasterInfo, myCoordinates, myPairOfAreaTargetMaps);
00850 
00851   myGrassProcess.exec();
00852 
00853 }

00868 void LaMainForm::on_pushButtonSave_clicked()
00869 {
00870   // Populate the model with all the form data
00871   QString mySelectedAreaUnit = QString(cbAreaUnits->currentText());
00872   AreaUnits myAreaUnits = (mySelectedAreaUnit == "Dunum") ? Dunum:Hectare;
00873 
00874   LaModel myModel;
00875   myModel.setName(lineEditSiteName->text());
00876   myModel.setPopulation(sbPopulation->value());
00877   myModel.setPeriod(lineEditPeriod->text());
00878   //myModel.setProjection(cbProjection->currentIndex());
00879   myModel.setEasting(lineEditEasting->text().toInt());
00880   myModel.setNorthing(lineEditNorthing->text().toInt());
00881   myModel.setEuclideanDistance(radioButtonEuclidean->isChecked());
00882   myModel.setWalkingTime(radioButtonWalkingTime->isChecked());
00883   myModel.setPathDistance(radioButtonPathDistance->isChecked());
00884   myModel.setPrecision(sbModelPrecision->value());
00885   myModel.setDietPercent(sliderDiet->value());
00886   myModel.setCropPercent(sliderCrop->value());
00887   myModel.setMeatPercent(sliderMeat->value());
00888   myModel.setCaloriesPerPersonDaily(sbDailyCalories->value());
00889   myModel.setDairyUse(sbDairyUse->value());
00890   myModel.setCommonLandValue(sbCommonRasterValue->value(), myAreaUnits);
00891   myModel.toXmlFile( LaUtils::getModelOutputDir() +
00892       QDir::separator() + myModel.guid() + ".xml");
00893   writeSettings();
00894 }
00895 
00896 void LaMainForm::writeResults(QString theText)
00897 {
00898   tbReport->append(theText);
00899 }
00900 
00901 bool LaMainForm::setComboToDefault(QComboBox * thepCombo, QString theDefault)
00902 {
00903   if (!theDefault.isEmpty())
00904   {
00905     //loop through list looking for a match
00906     for ( int myCounter = 0; myCounter < thepCombo->count(); myCounter++ )
00907     {
00908       thepCombo->setCurrentIndex(myCounter);
00909       if (thepCombo->itemData(myCounter,Qt::UserRole)==theDefault)
00910       {
00911         break;
00912       }
00913     }
00914   }
00915   else
00916   {
00917     return false;
00918   }
00919   return true;
00920 }
00921 
00922 void LaMainForm::helpItemClicked(QTreeWidgetItem * thepCurrentItem, QTreeWidgetItem * thepOldItem)
00923 {
00924   writeResults("Item clicked in help browser: " + thepCurrentItem->text(0).toLocal8Bit());
00925   QFile myQFile( ":/helpDocs/" + thepCurrentItem->text(0)  + ".html" );
00926   if ( myQFile.open( QIODevice::ReadOnly ) ) {
00927     //now we parse the loc file, checking each line for its taxon
00928     QTextStream myStream( &myQFile );
00929     textHelp->setHtml(myStream.readAll());
00930     myQFile.close();
00931   }
00932   else
00933   {
00934     writeResults("Help resource for : " + thepCurrentItem->text(0).toLocal8Bit() + " not found!");
00935   }
00936 }

00943 
00944 int LaMainForm::getCalorieTargets() //returns calorie target QPair <Crops , Dairy>
00945 {
00946   LaModel myModel;
00947   int myReturnValue;
00948   connect(&myModel, SIGNAL(message( QString )),
00949            this, SLOT(logMessage( QString )));
00950   // Get a list of the selected animals
00951   QMap<QString,QString> mySelectedAnimalsMap;
00952   //  <animal guid <enabled, animalparamters guid>>
00953   QMapIterator<QString, QPair<bool, QString> > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
00954   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
00955   {
00956     myAnimalIterator.next();
00957     QPair<bool,QString> myPair = myAnimalIterator.value();
00958     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
00959     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myPair.second;
00960     bool mySelectedFlag = myPair.first;
00961     if (mySelectedFlag)
00962     {
00963       mySelectedAnimalsMap.insert(myAnimalGuid,myAnimalParameterGuid);
00964     }
00965   }
00966   myModel.setAnimals(mySelectedAnimalsMap);
00967 
00968   // Get a list of the selected crops
00969   QMap<QString,QString> mySelectedCropsMap;
00970   //  <crop guid <enabled, cropparamters guid>>
00971   QMapIterator<QString, QPair<bool, QString> > myCropIterator(mCropsMap);
00972   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
00973   {
00974     myCropIterator.next();
00975     QPair<bool,QString> myPair = myCropIterator.value();
00976     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
00977     QString myCropParameterGuid = myPair.second;
00978     bool mySelectedFlag = myPair.first;
00979     if (mySelectedFlag)
00980     {
00981       mySelectedCropsMap.insert(myCropGuid,myCropParameterGuid);
00982     }
00983   }
00984   myModel.setCrops(mySelectedCropsMap);
00985   QString mySelectedAreaUnit = QString(cbAreaUnits->currentText());
00986   AreaUnits myAreaUnits = (mySelectedAreaUnit == "Dunum") ? Dunum:Hectare;
00987   // Populate the model with all the form data
00988   myModel.setName(lineEditSiteName->text());
00989   myModel.setPopulation(sbPopulation->value());
00990   myModel.setPeriod(lineEditPeriod->text());
00991   //myModel.setProjection(cbProjection->currentIndex());
00992   myModel.setEasting(lineEditEasting->text().toInt());
00993   myModel.setNorthing(lineEditNorthing->text().toInt());
00994   myModel.setEuclideanDistance(radioButtonEuclidean->isChecked());
00995   myModel.setWalkingTime(radioButtonWalkingTime->isChecked());
00996   myModel.setPathDistance(radioButtonPathDistance->isChecked());
00997   myModel.setPrecision(sbModelPrecision->value());
00998   myModel.setDietPercent(sliderDiet->value());
00999   myModel.setCropPercent(sliderCrop->value());
01000   myModel.setMeatPercent(sliderMeat->value());
01001   myModel.setCaloriesPerPersonDaily(sbDailyCalories->value());
01002   myModel.setCommonLandValue(sbCommonRasterValue->value(), myAreaUnits);
01003   myModel.setDairyUse(sbDairyUse->value());
01004   
01005   int myTotalCaloriesFromDairy;
01006   myTotalCaloriesFromDairy = myModel.getTotalCaloriesFromDairy();
01007   
01008   myReturnValue = myTotalCaloriesFromDairy;
01009   return myReturnValue;
01010 }

01017 
01018 void LaMainForm::cropCalcClicked(QListWidgetItem * thepCurrentItem, QListWidgetItem * thepOldItem)
01019 {
01020   // zero trap to prevent seg faults
01021   if (thepCurrentItem==0) {return;}
01022 
01023   // ensure that the crops and animals are both at 100%
01024   LaModel myModel;
01025   if (labelCropCheck->text() != "100\%" or labelAnimalCheck->text() != "100\%")
01026   {
01027     tbReport->setText("Check that Animals and Crops are both at 100%\n");
01028     tbReport->append("I am NOT going to do anything until they are!");
01029     return;
01030   }
01031 
01032   connect(&myModel, SIGNAL(message( QString )),
01033              this, SLOT(logMessage( QString )));
01034   // Get a list of the selected animals
01035   QMap<QString,QString> mySelectedAnimalsMap;
01036   //  <animal guid <enabled, animalparamters guid>>
01037   QMapIterator<QString, QPair<bool, QString> > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
01038   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
01039   {
01040     myAnimalIterator.next();
01041     QPair<bool,QString> myPair = myAnimalIterator.value();
01042     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
01043     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myPair.second;
01044     bool mySelectedFlag = myPair.first;
01045     if (mySelectedFlag)
01046     {
01047       mySelectedAnimalsMap.insert(myAnimalGuid,myAnimalParameterGuid);
01048     }
01049   }
01050   myModel.setAnimals(mySelectedAnimalsMap);
01051 
01052   // Get a list of the selected crops
01053   QMap<QString,QString> mySelectedCropsMap;
01054   //  <crop guid <enabled, cropparamters guid>>
01055   QMapIterator<QString, QPair<bool, QString> > myCropIterator(mCropsMap);
01056   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
01057   {
01058     myCropIterator.next();
01059     QPair<bool,QString> myPair = myCropIterator.value();
01060     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
01061     QString myCropParameterGuid = myPair.second;
01062     bool mySelectedFlag = myPair.first;
01063     if (mySelectedFlag)
01064     {
01065       mySelectedCropsMap.insert(myCropGuid,myCropParameterGuid);
01066     }
01067   }
01068   myModel.setCrops(mySelectedCropsMap);
01069   QString mySelectedAreaUnit = QString(cbAreaUnits->currentText());
01070   AreaUnits myAreaUnits = (mySelectedAreaUnit == "Dunum") ? Dunum:Hectare;
01071   // Populate the model with all the form data
01072   myModel.setName(lineEditSiteName->text());
01073   myModel.setPopulation(sbPopulation->value());
01074   myModel.setPeriod(lineEditPeriod->text());
01075   //myModel.setProjection(cbProjection->currentIndex());
01076   myModel.setEasting(lineEditEasting->text().toInt());
01077   myModel.setNorthing(lineEditNorthing->text().toInt());
01078   myModel.setEuclideanDistance(radioButtonEuclidean->isChecked());
01079   myModel.setWalkingTime(radioButtonWalkingTime->isChecked());
01080   myModel.setPathDistance(radioButtonPathDistance->isChecked());
01081   myModel.setPrecision(sbModelPrecision->value());
01082   myModel.setDietPercent(sliderDiet->value());
01083   myModel.setCropPercent(sliderCrop->value());
01084   myModel.setMeatPercent(sliderMeat->value());
01085   myModel.setCaloriesPerPersonDaily(sbDailyCalories->value());
01086   myModel.setCommonLandValue(sbCommonRasterValue->value(), myAreaUnits);
01087   myModel.setDairyUse(sbDairyUse->value());
01088    tbReport->setHtml(myModel.toHtml());
01089   myModel.DoCalculations();
01090 
01091   QString myGuid = thepCurrentItem->data(Qt::UserRole).toString();
01092   LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(myGuid);
01093   lblCropPicCalcs->setPixmap(myCrop.imageFile());
01094   QMap <QString, QString> myCalcsMap = myModel.calcsCropsMap();
01095   textBrowserResultsCrop->setText(myCalcsMap.value(myGuid));
01096 }
01097 
01098 void LaMainForm::animalCalcClicked(QListWidgetItem * thepCurrentItem, QListWidgetItem * thepOldItem)
01099 {
01100   // zero trap to prevent seg faults
01101   if (thepCurrentItem==0) {return;}
01102 
01103   // ensure that the crops and animals are both at 100%
01104   LaModel myModel;
01105   if (labelCropCheck->text() != "100\%" or labelAnimalCheck->text() != "100\%")
01106   {
01107     tbReport->setText("Check that Animals and Crops are both at 100%\n");
01108     tbReport->append("I am NOT going to do anything until they are!");
01109     return;
01110   }
01111 
01112   // show the user that the computer is thinking
01113   //progressBarCalcs->reset();
01114   //progressBarCalcs->setRange(0,0);
01115   AreaUnits myAreaUnits = (cbAreaUnits->currentText() == "Dunum") ? Dunum : Hectare;
01116 
01117   connect(&myModel, SIGNAL(message( QString )),
01118              this, SLOT(logMessage( QString )));
01119   // Get a list of the selected animals
01120   QMap<QString,QString> mySelectedAnimalsMap;
01121   // <animal guid <enabled, animalparamters guid>>
01122   QMapIterator<QString, QPair<bool, QString> > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
01123   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
01124   {
01125     myAnimalIterator.next();
01126     QPair<bool,QString> myPair = myAnimalIterator.value();
01127     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
01128     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myPair.second;
01129     bool mySelectedFlag = myPair.first;
01130     if (mySelectedFlag)
01131     {
01132       mySelectedAnimalsMap.insert(myAnimalGuid,myAnimalParameterGuid);
01133     }
01134   }
01135   myModel.setAnimals(mySelectedAnimalsMap);
01136 
01137   // Get a list of the selected crops
01138   QMap<QString,QString> mySelectedCropsMap;
01139   QMapIterator<QString, QPair<bool, QString> > myCropIterator(mCropsMap);
01140   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
01141   {
01142     myCropIterator.next();
01143     QPair<bool,QString> myPair = myCropIterator.value();
01144     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
01145     QString myCropParameterGuid = myPair.second;
01146     bool mySelectedFlag = myPair.first;
01147     if (mySelectedFlag)
01148     {
01149       mySelectedCropsMap.insert(myCropGuid,myCropParameterGuid);
01150     }
01151   }
01152   myModel.setCrops(mySelectedCropsMap);
01153   QString mySelectedAreaUnit = QString(cbAreaUnits->currentText());
01154   // Populate the model with all the form data
01155   myModel.setName(lineEditSiteName->text());
01156   myModel.setPopulation(sbPopulation->value());
01157   myModel.setPeriod(lineEditPeriod->text());
01158   //myModel.setProjection(cbProjection->currentIndex());
01159   myModel.setEasting(lineEditEasting->text().toInt());
01160   myModel.setNorthing(lineEditNorthing->text().toInt());
01161   myModel.setEuclideanDistance(radioButtonEuclidean->isChecked());
01162   myModel.setWalkingTime(radioButtonWalkingTime->isChecked());
01163   myModel.setPathDistance(radioButtonPathDistance->isChecked());
01164   myModel.setPrecision(sbModelPrecision->value());
01165   myModel.setDietPercent(sliderDiet->value());
01166   myModel.setCropPercent(sliderCrop->value());
01167   myModel.setMeatPercent(sliderMeat->value());
01168   myModel.setCaloriesPerPersonDaily(sbDailyCalories->value());
01169   QString myAreaUnitsText = (cbAreaUnits->currentText());
01170   myModel.setCommonLandAreaUnits(myAreaUnits);
01171   //myModel.setCommonLandValue(sbCommonRasterValue->value());
01172   myModel.setCommonLandValue(sbCommonRasterValue->value(), myAreaUnits);
01173   myModel.setDairyUse(sbDairyUse->value());
01174   tbReport->setHtml(myModel.toHtml());
01175   myModel.DoCalculations();
01176 
01177   QString myGuid = thepCurrentItem->data(Qt::UserRole).toString();
01178   LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myGuid);
01179   lblAnimalPicCalcs->setPixmap(myAnimal.imageFile());
01180   QMap <QString, QString> myCalcsMap = myModel.calcsAnimalsMap();
01181   textBrowserResultsAnimals->setText(myCalcsMap.value(myGuid));
01182   progressBarCalcs->setMaximum(100);
01183 }
01184 
01185 void LaMainForm::printCropsAndAnimals()
01186 {
01187   tbReport->clear();
01188   QMapIterator<QString, QPair<bool, QString> > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
01189   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
01190   {
01191     myAnimalIterator.next();
01192     QPair<bool,QString> myPair = myAnimalIterator.value();
01193     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
01194     bool mySelectedFlag = myPair.first;
01195     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myPair.second;
01196     QString myText = "Animal <" + myAnimalGuid.toLocal8Bit() +
01197       " , <";
01198     mySelectedFlag ? myText += "true," : myText += "false,";
01199     myText +=  myAnimalParameterGuid.toLocal8Bit() ;
01200     myText += "> >";
01201     tbLogs->append(myText);
01202   }
01203 
01204   QMapIterator<QString, QPair<bool, QString> > myCropIterator(mCropsMap);
01205   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
01206   {
01207     myCropIterator.next();
01208     QPair<bool,QString> myPair = myCropIterator.value();
01209     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
01210     bool mySelectedFlag = myPair.first;
01211     QString myCropParameterGuid = myPair.second;
01212     QString myText = "Crop <" + myCropGuid.toLocal8Bit() +
01213       " , <";
01214     mySelectedFlag ? myText += "true," : myText += "false,";
01215     myText +=  myCropParameterGuid.toLocal8Bit() ;
01216     myText += "> >";
01217     tbLogs->append(myText);
01218   }
01219 }
01220 
01221 void LaMainForm::logMessage(QString theMessage)
01222 {
01223   tbLogs->append(theMessage);
01224   tbLogs->ensureCursorVisible();
01225 }

01228 void LaMainForm::showAnimalDefinitionReport(LaAnimal &theAnimal, LaAnimalParameter &theAnimalParameter)
01229 {
01230   QString myHtml;
01231   myHtml = "<body>";
01232   myHtml += "<table width=\"100%\">";
01233   myHtml += "<tr>";
01234   myHtml += "<td>";
01235   myHtml += theAnimal.toHtml();
01236   myHtml += "</td>";
01237   myHtml += "<td>";
01238   myHtml += theAnimalParameter.toHtml();
01239   myHtml += "</td>";
01240   myHtml += "</tr>";
01241   myHtml += "</table>";
01242   myHtml += "</body>";
01243   textBrowserAnimalDefinition->document()->setDefaultStyleSheet(LaUtils::getStandardCss());
01244   textBrowserAnimalDefinition->setHtml(myHtml);
01245 }
